SpeakerProfile.Biography:
Jay Smith is a PMO Architect and Evangelist for Tyson Foods, Inc. and a Microsoft ASP .NET MVP. He is one of the founding members of the Northwest Arkansas .Net Userâ€™s Group, organizer for the Northwest Arkansas Code Camp, Northwest Arkansas Give Camp, creator of Community Camp, host of User Group Radio and a blogger at http://jaysmith.us.
When Jay is not working to improve his coding skills or building the developer community in Northwest Arkansas he is an avid motorcycle enthusiast and homebrewer.
